T02D2835:178b-0: @178b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs sku gsung thugs yon tan
T02D2835:178b-1: phrin las lhun gyis grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2835:178b-2: // dang por re zhig byang chub sems dpa'i blo
T02D2835:178b-3: gros sbyangs pa dag / chos thams cad ngo bo
T02D2835:178b-5: bdag gir 'dzin chags pa sdug bsngal ba dang /
T02D2835:178b-6: phongs pa rnams kyis 'gyur ba mthong bas mi bzad pa skyes nas /
T02D2835:178b-7: thog mar gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor 'jug pa
T02D2835:178b-8: na bdag gi ltos pa ring du spangs nas snying
T02D2835:178b-9: rje chen pos gzhan gyis ma bskul bar bdag 'jug
T02D2835:178b-10: par ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlab bar bya'o
T02D2835:178b-11: // brtan pa'i gnas dang g-yo ba lus dang ngag dang yid //
T02D2835:178b-12: rnam kun nyer spyod gzhal med khang bzangs rdo rje'i sku //
T02D2835:178b-13: gsang sngags dam tshig nga ro bcu drug mthar gnas dang //
T02D2835:178b-14: pha rol phyin bcu lha yi sbyor ba rnam dag bsgom //
T02D2835:178b-15: 'di na gang dag don mi min spyod //
T02D2835:178b-16: smad pa'i gnas la blo rab chags //
T02D2835:178b-17: ldongs pas sdig pa mang ldan pa //
T02D2835:178b-18: de dag rang bzhin zhi ba'o //
T02D2835:178b-19: chos gang la ni rnam par shes //
T02D2835:178b-20: de shes nyid ni pha rol 'gro //
T02D2835:178b-23: ae ma'o 'gro ba yang dag spyod //
T02D2835:178b-24: gang spyod de yin gzhan mi 'gyur //
T02D2835:179a-1: min gnas sogs gang brtags pa //
T02D2835:179a-2: nam yang skye sogs mi dmigs pa'o //
T02D2835:179a-3: 'on kyang log pas cig shos su //
T02D2835:179a-4: bsgribs nas dri mar khrid pa yang //
T02D2835:179a-5: bdag gi las gsum yan lag lngas //
T02D2835:179a-6: dag bcas lhag mar mi bya'o //
T02D2835:179a-7: spyan ras gzigs mgon nyid dam bcas //
T02D2835:179a-8: spyad pa spyod pa'i rim ji bzhin //
T02D2835:179a-9: sangs rgyas sras po brtse chen yang //
T02D2835:179a-11: 'di ni ji ltar bdag nyid dang //
T02D2835:179a-13: de bzhin lus can thams cad kyang //
T02D2835:179a-14: mtshungs na bdag gcig bde ba brtson //
T02D2835:179a-15: yon tan phrin las thams cad la //
T02D2835:179a-16: rgyas btab rgyal sras 'bad par bya'o //
T02D2835:179a-17: gang zhig phan btags drin shes pa //
T02D2835:179a-18: de yang kun gyis bsngags 'os na //
T02D2835:179a-19: ma bcol rang dga' byin rlob pa'i //
T02D2835:179a-20: bdag nyid chen po cis mi bsngags //
